title: 服务器装了him的插件
author: JKEK
txt_content:
可是我找了好长时间都没有找到him him也不主动来找我 求大神看这个弄得对不对Herobrine:
# The higher the chance, the more rare actions are.
actionChance: 100000
# Can he generate and send players to the "Nightmare World"?
nightmareWorldEnabled: true
# Send messages or be quiet.
sendMessages: true
# Modify the world (bury players, add torches, etc.)
modifyWorld: true
# Can he build pyramids?
buildPyramids: true
# Can he steal from chests?
stealFromChests: true
# What is his name? (This will affect his skin!)
entityName: Herobrine
# Don't atta

replies.author: moonshell
replies.txt_content: 你服務器開的世界是不是 world 如果不是 你這插件的配置文件要更改
